title: Email Management
successMessage: Email address changed successfully! The user can now use this email to log in.
errorMessage: Failed to change email address. Please try again.
note: Changing a user's email address will immediately allow them to use the new email for login. The new email will be automatically verified.

errors.INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: You do not have permission to manage users
errors.HTTP_EXCEPTION: Failed to change email address. Please try again.
errors.generic: Failed to change email address. Please try again.
